comments.body:
Make this a `noarch` package. The resulting package contents don't depend on the Python version.

```suggestion
  number: 0
  noarch: python
```

Thanks for stepping in @xhochy!

Actually, judging from this:

https://github.com/fantix/aiocontextvars/blob/2b178feb36609f4447110c383da1f26b9c98f513/setup.py#L14-L16

it doesn't look like a `noarch`, but then inside the package `contextvars` is imported without any condition. Which leads me to wonder if the `setup.py` `install_requires` is somehow wrong.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +12,16 @@build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps -vv"
